inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Dagger', 'CriticalChance', 'Stackable', 3); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Short Sword', 'CriticalChance', 'Stackable', 3); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Longsword', 'CriticalChance', 'Stackable', 3); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Bastard Sword', 'CriticalChance', 'Stackable', 3); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Handaxe', 'CriticalChance', 'Stackable', 3); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Battleaxe', 'CriticalChance', 'Stackable', 3); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Waraxe', 'CriticalChance', 'Stackable', 3); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Critical Strike
description: You gain a 3 percent greater chance to inflict critical hits with many one handed slashing and piercing weapons, including Daggers, Short Swords, Longswords, Handaxes, Battleaxes, Short Spears, Bastard Swords, and Waraxes.
